library(DT)
library(lubridate)
library(MMWRweek)
library(dplyr)

Uge <-  35:52
ugedage <- rep(0,18)

ugedage[1] <- 5
ugenavn <- c("mandag","tirsdag","onsdag","torsdag","fredag","lørdag","søndag")

usugedage <- ugenavn[as.POSIXlt(MMWRweek2Date(rep(as.integer(format(Sys.Date(), "%Y")),length(Uge)), Uge, rep( 2,length(Uge))))$wday]

Ugestart <- paste(usugedage,MMWRweek2Date(rep(as.integer(format(Sys.Date(), "%Y")),length(Uge)), Uge, rep( 2,length(Uge))))
